participant_1.background:
My most prized possession is my comfy couch, where I can relax and enjoy a bowl of pistachio ice cream.
i love to play basketball.
i babysit for the woman who lives next door.
I love Christmas because I get to spend time with my family and eat lots of delicious food.
I find that reading about the history of the world and its philosophy helps me put my own troubles into perspective.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy spending time in my garden, tending to my plants and watching them grow.
I wake up early to get a head start on my day, and I make sure to schedule time for soccer practice and spending time with my kids.
I am more concerned with my creations than my appearance.
I enjoy exercising and try to work out as often as I can, but it can be hard to find the time, especially with my night shift schedule.
I'm a musician who recently became truthful with my coach

content.text: Doing alright! I'm just taking a break from work to relax for a bit.
I'm glad to hear that! What do you do for work?
I'm a musician! I play in a band and we're currently working on our new album.
That sounds really cool! I've always wanted to play an instrument but I'm not very musical.
It's never too late to learn! I started playing when I was a kid and I'm still learning new things all the time.
I might have to look into it! Do you have any hobbies outside of music?

I like to spend time in my garden, tending to my plants and watching them grow. I also enjoy exercising and try to work out as often as I can, but it can be hard to find the time, especially with my night shift schedule.
That sounds really nice! I love to garden too, but I don't have a lot of space for it right now.
I'm lucky to have a big backyard so I can grow a lot of different things.
That's awesome! I'm sure it's really rewarding to see your plants grow and thrive.
It is! It's a great feeling to know that you're growing something healthy and delicious.
I'm sure it is! I'm going to have to start gardening again soon.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to relax.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about gardening
